code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React,{useRef}from"react";import{auth}from"../firebase";import"./SignupScreen.css";function SignupScreen(){var emailRef=useRef(null);var passwordRef=useRef(null);var register=function register(e){e.preventDefault();auth.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);}).catch(function(error){alert(error.message);});};var signIn=function signIn(e){e.preventDefault();auth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);}).catch(function(error){return alert(error.message);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"signupScreen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:emailRef,type:"email",placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:passwordRef,type:"password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",onClick:signIn,children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"signupScreen__gray",children:"New to Netflix?"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"signupScreen__link",onClick:register,children:"Sign Up now"})]})]})});}export default SignupScreen;
